to find a more efficient UHF channel utilization pattern of assignments
should be undertaken, A solution to this problem, possibly utilizing
computer techniques, would provide improved opportunities in the future
for all types of television operation. It has not yet been possible
to define the spectrum needs of Airborne ETV, which undoubtedly could
be better accommodated under an improved assignment pattern.
September 1, 1961 JANSKY & BAILEY
Washington, D, C*
